sentences.en: a young woman of impressive educational attainments
sentences.cn: 一位学业成就斐然的年轻女子

sentences.en: Following a day of medical research, the conference focused on educational practices.
sentences.cn: 在就医学研究专题讨论一天后，会议接下来的主题集中在教学实践上。

sentences.en: He devoted his life to the educational cause of the motherland.
sentences.cn: 他为祖国的教育事业贡献了一生.

sentences.en: He fiercely criticised self-styled educational experts for ignoring Shakespeare.
sentences.cn: 他强烈批评那些无视莎士比亚的自诩为教育专家的人。

sentences.en: He was a champion for Latinos and blacks within the educational system.
sentences.cn: 他一直致力于在教育系统内为美籍拉美人和黑人争取权益。

sentences.en: His life was entirely given up to the educational work.
sentences.cn: 他的一生统统献给了教育工作.

sentences.en: I think we need to improve our educational system in general.
sentences.cn: 我认为有必要从整体上改进我们的教育体系。

sentences.en: Only the educational elite go 〔 goes 〕 to Oxford or Cambridge.
sentences.cn: 只有学业上的精英才能上牛津或剑桥大学.

sentences.en: Recent events have radicalized opinion on educational matters.
sentences.cn: 最近发生的事使人们对教育的看法有了全新的改变。

sentences.en: Success should not be measured solely by educational achievement.
sentences.cn: 成功与否不应只用学业成绩来衡量.

sentences.en: The college has been co-educational since 1971.
sentences.cn: 这所大学从1971年起开始实行男女同校。

sentences.en: Their progress at work was mirrored by their children's educational advance.
sentences.cn: 子女在学业上有所进步，他们在工作上也就会有所起色。

sentences.en: To me the only justification for a zoo is educational.
sentences.cn: 对我来说，动物园存在的唯一正当理由是其教育作用。

sentences.en: We are chiefly concerned with improving educational standards.
sentences.cn: 我们主要关心的是提高教育水平。

words.tran_cn: 教育家；教育工作者；教师
训练；教导；培育（educate的过去分词形式）
